title: War crimes tribunal indicts Colombia’s former army chief over extrajudicial executions
description:
Colombia’s war crimes tribunal JEP indicted former army commander Jaime Lasprilla and four other generals for their alleged involvement in 200 homicides. The generals are part of a group of…

title: Uribe helped plan 1997 massacre, former warlord tells Colombia’s war crimes tribunal
description:
The former commander of the now-defunct paramilitary organization AUC told Colombia’s war crimes tribunal JEP that former President Alvaro Uribe was involved in a 1997 massacre. Former AUC chief Salvatore…
